DOC.brief_summary: Children 5-17 year age sustain non-operative distal forearm ( radius and/or ulna ) clavicular fracture randomize receive either ibuprofen oral morphine need pain relief first 24 hour follow discharge emergency department . Pain assess use self-report Faces pain scale revise ( FPS-R ) . We hypothesize oral morphine result great pain relief ibuprofen .
